content: आशंस् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> (rarely P.) {@--1@} To hope for, expect, desire, wish or long for; स्वकार्यसिद्धिं पुनराशशंसे <ls>Ku. 3. 57</ls>; <ls>Bk. 14. 70</ls>, <ls n="Bk. 14.">90</ls>; <ls>Ś. 2. 15</ls>; <ls>M. 1</ls>; मनोरथाय नाशंसे <ls>Ś. 7. 13.</ls> {@--2@} To bless, wish well to; एवं ते देवा आशंसंतु <ls>Mk. 1</ls>; इत्याशशंसे करणैरबाह्यैः <ls>R. 14. 50.</ls> {@--3@} To speak, say. {@--4@} To tell; <ls>Ku. 3. 14.</ls> {@--5@} To ask for, beg. {@--6@} To praise. {@--7@} To repeat, recite. {@--8@} To fear, be afraid of. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To render famous or celebrated.
